snippet: Investigators released an analysis using a set of probability tools that they say takes them closer to locating the jet in the southern Indian Ocean.
abstract: Investigators have narrowed possible flight path of missing Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 using set of probability tools; investigation is focusing on area of Indian Ocean off southwest coast of Australia.
lead_paragraph: Investigators released an analysis using a set of probability tools that they say takes them closer to locating the jet in the southern Indian Ocean.

headline.main: Searchers Refine Possible Path of Lost Malaysian Flight 370
headline.print_headline: Searchers Refine Possible Path of Lost Malaysian Jet
